oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of 3rd Avenue North and Charlotte Avenue, 1959
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the area around 3rd Avenue North and Charlotte Avenue in downtown Nashville. The State Department of Employment Security building is visible in the foreground, and the State Capitol and Cordell Hull Building are visible in the background. Photographed by John E. Acuff, Jr. of the Nashville Housing Authority, 29 July 1959. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
